text.content: Introduction

rich_text.plain_text: Introduction

text.content: Hybrid work has become the norm, and Zoom Docs was created specifically for this purpose, working alongside Zoom Workspace to solve some of the most pressing challenges in the workplace: repetitive tasks, time wasted switching between multiple platforms, information overload, and the need for seamless cross-functional collaboration.

rich_text.plain_text: Hybrid work has become the norm, and Zoom Docs was created specifically for this purpose, working alongside Zoom Workspace to solve some of the most pressing challenges in the workplace: repetitive tasks, time wasted switching between multiple platforms, information overload, and the need for seamless cross-functional collaboration.

text.content: With Zoom Docs, teams can more easily maintain consistency and productivity regardless of location, completing daily document creation or collaboration, synchronizing and utilizing information before and after meetings, knowledge preservation, project management, and other work.

rich_text.plain_text: With Zoom Docs, teams can more easily maintain consistency and productivity regardless of location, completing daily document creation or collaboration, synchronizing and utilizing information before and after meetings, knowledge preservation, project management, and other work.

text.content: The launch of Zoom Docs is not merely an incremental feature but a strategic pivot aimed at making Zoom an indispensable part of daily work. By integrating Zoom Docs into the existing platform, Zoom is doubling down on building a coherent, one-stop communication and collaboration ecosystem.

rich_text.plain_text: The launch of Zoom Docs is not merely an incremental feature but a strategic pivot aimed at making Zoom an indispensable part of daily work. By integrating Zoom Docs into the existing platform, Zoom is doubling down on building a coherent, one-stop communication and collaboration ecosystem.

text.content: Explorations

rich_text.plain_text: Explorations

text.content: Challenges

rich_text.plain_text: Challenges

text.content: Traditional documents (such as Google Doc, Microsoft Word) are directly composed of characters and elements, with users accustomed to intuitive operations through fixed toolbars. In recent years, new document tools represented by Notion have introduced Block-based content organization. Blocks, as unified interaction containers, make content dragging, controlling, and editing more flexible, bringing greater freedom and layout possibilities. At the same time, Notion simplifies the interaction interface and improves efficiency for some users through shortcuts such as invoking insertion menus.

rich_text.plain_text: Traditional documents (such as Google Doc, Microsoft Word) are directly composed of characters and elements, with users accustomed to intuitive operations through fixed toolbars. In recent years, new document tools represented by Notion have introduced Block-based content organization. Blocks, as unified interaction containers, make content dragging, controlling, and editing more flexible, bringing greater freedom and layout possibilities. At the same time, Notion simplifies the interaction interface and improves efficiency for some users through shortcuts such as invoking insertion menus.

text.content: In our early research, we found that while many Notion users praised its clean experience, many traditional document users did not continue using Notion after trying it. Through user interviews and online research, we learned that some traditional users found it difficult to locate the tools they needed in Notion's clean interface, and the interaction method relying solely on shortcuts and contextual menus left them feeling insecure.

rich_text.plain_text: In our early research, we found that while many Notion users praised its clean experience, many traditional document users did not continue using Notion after trying it. Through user interviews and online research, we learned that some traditional users found it difficult to locate the tools they needed in Notion's clean interface, and the interaction method relying solely on shortcuts and contextual menus left them feeling insecure.

text.content: Among Zoom's user base, traditional document tool users represent a high proportion. We face the challenge of conflicting demands between familiarity and efficiency, security and simplicity, as well as between traditional document users and new document tool users.

rich_text.plain_text: Among Zoom's user base, traditional document tool users represent a high proportion. We face the challenge of conflicting demands between familiarity and efficiency, security and simplicity, as well as between traditional document users and new document tool users.

text.content: Goals

rich_text.plain_text: Goals

text.content: The core goal of Zoom Docs is to enable both ordinary and advanced users to efficiently complete tasks, providing a simple, efficient, and familiar document editing experience for most ordinary users while meeting advanced users' needs for flexibility and efficient operations.

rich_text.plain_text: The core goal of Zoom Docs is to enable both ordinary and advanced users to efficiently complete tasks, providing a simple, efficient, and familiar document editing experience for most ordinary users while meeting advanced users' needs for flexibility and efficient operations.

text.content: Through our design, we aim to achieve:

rich_text.plain_text: Through our design, we aim to achieve:

text.content: Solution

rich_text.plain_text: Solution

text.content: 1. Rich document content types

rich_text.plain_text: 1. Rich document content types

text.content: Zoom Docs supports a rich array of content elements and features, including basic text elements, layout and display types, multimedia, data visualization and management, third-party integrations, automation, and more.

rich_text.plain_text: Zoom Docs supports a rich array of content elements and features, including basic text elements, layout and display types, multimedia, data visualization and management, third-party integrations, automation, and more.

text.content: 2. Interaction models for different document stages

rich_text.plain_text: 2. Interaction models for different document stages

text.content: 2.1 Creating elements

rich_text.plain_text: 2.1 Creating elements

text.content: Start with clarity and familiarity

rich_text.plain_text: Start with clarity and familiarity

text.content: In an empty document state, users can begin exploring from the familiar top toolbar, start from the plus button to the left of the cursor, or follow placeholder prompts to explore shortcuts

rich_text.plain_text: In an empty document state, users can begin exploring from the familiar top toolbar, start from the plus button to the left of the cursor, or follow placeholder prompts to explore shortcuts

text.content: If users familiar with newer document tools don't need the top toolbar, they can click the collapse button to hide it

rich_text.plain_text: If users familiar with newer document tools don't need the top toolbar, they can click the collapse button to hide it

text.content: Choose different forms to express

rich_text.plain_text: Choose different forms to express

text.content: Clicking the fixed "+" button in the top toolbar, the "+" button before a paragraph, or typing "/", all invoke the menu for creating new content, from which users can select an item to add content

rich_text.plain_text: Clicking the fixed "+" button in the top toolbar, the "+" button before a paragraph, or typing "/", all invoke the menu for creating new content, from which users can select an item to add content

text.content: 2.2 Editing existing content

rich_text.plain_text: 2.2 Editing existing content

text.content: Convenient paragraph style editing

rich_text.plain_text: Convenient paragraph style editing

text.content: When hovering over a single Block, the type name on the left handle helps confirm content format consistency, with a subtle color tone to prevent frequent distraction;

rich_text.plain_text: When hovering over a single Block, the type name on the left handle helps confirm content format consistency, with a subtle color tone to prevent frequent distraction;

text.content: Clicking the handle opens the Block Menu, allowing for content type conversion and other paragraph-level operations

rich_text.plain_text: Clicking the handle opens the Block Menu, allowing for content type conversion and other paragraph-level operations

text.content: Quick layout adjustments

rich_text.plain_text: Quick layout adjustments

text.content: Dragging Blocks allows for content reordering or creating columns

rich_text.plain_text: Dragging Blocks allows for content reordering or creating columns

text.content: Contextual toolbars, efficient and convenient

rich_text.plain_text: Contextual toolbars, efficient and convenient

text.content: When selecting various elements, corresponding contextual toolbars appear near the elements for quick adjustments

rich_text.plain_text: When selecting various elements, corresponding contextual toolbars appear near the elements for quick adjustments

text.content: 2.3 Collaboration

rich_text.plain_text: 2.3 Collaboration

text.content: When multiple people collaborate to edit or read the same document, we sometimes have the following needs:

rich_text.plain_text: When multiple people collaborate to edit or read the same document, we sometimes have the following needs:

text.content: "Want to know who else is viewing this document at the same time"‚Äî

rich_text.plain_text: "Want to know who else is viewing this document at the same time"‚Äî

text.content: Avatars at the top of the document show current visitors;

rich_text.plain_text: Avatars at the top of the document show current visitors;

text.content: "Want to know which parts others are editing so I can edit other paragraphs first"‚Äî

rich_text.plain_text: "Want to know which parts others are editing so I can edit other paragraphs first"‚Äî

text.content: Click on the top avatars to jump to the corresponding location, with collaborators shown on the left side of paragraphs they're editing;

rich_text.plain_text: Click on the top avatars to jump to the corresponding location, with collaborators shown on the left side of paragraphs they're editing;

text.content: "Want to see what others are writing in real-time, like face-to-face discussions"‚Äî

rich_text.plain_text: "Want to see what others are writing in real-time, like face-to-face discussions"‚Äî

text.content: Collaborators' cursors are visible in real-time.

rich_text.plain_text: Collaborators' cursors are visible in real-time.

text.content: Smooth collaboration in meetings

rich_text.plain_text: Smooth collaboration in meetings

text.content: The real-time dynamics of avatars and cursors are also applied to document sharing in meetings, better supporting seamless co-creation in scenarios such as synchronous discussions and brainstorming

rich_text.plain_text: The real-time dynamics of avatars and cursors are also applied to document sharing in meetings, better supporting seamless co-creation in scenarios such as synchronous discussions and brainstorming

text.content: Some small details

rich_text.plain_text: Some small details

text.content: 1. For long documents, how to quickly adjust content order?

rich_text.plain_text: 1. For long documents, how to quickly adjust content order?

text.content: By dragging titles in the outline, quickly adjust the order of various headings and their content

rich_text.plain_text: By dragging titles in the outline, quickly adjust the order of various headings and their content

text.content: 2. Simple or intuitive? Tradeoffs in toolbar design

rich_text.plain_text: 2. Simple or intuitive? Tradeoffs in toolbar design

text.content: Traditional document users' demand for stable and intuitive toolbars conflicts with new document users' preference for clean interface elements.

rich_text.plain_text: Traditional document users' demand for stable and intuitive toolbars conflicts with new document users' preference for clean interface elements.

text.content: After comparing and discussing multiple solutions, we conducted user testing and interviews, choosing the direction of "displaying the top toolbar by default, with users who don't need it able to manually collapse it, while contextual toolbars appear near corresponding elements when selected." This prioritizes traditional document users' sense of security with new tools, while allowing users of newer document tools to choose a cleaner interface, also ensuring the shortest interaction path in various scenarios.

rich_text.plain_text: After comparing and discussing multiple solutions, we conducted user testing and interviews, choosing the direction of "displaying the top toolbar by default, with users who don't need it able to manually collapse it, while contextual toolbars appear near corresponding elements when selected." This prioritizes traditional document users' sense of security with new tools, while allowing users of newer document tools to choose a cleaner interface, also ensuring the shortest interaction path in various scenarios.

text.content: 3. Efficient or clear? Menu interaction design

rich_text.plain_text: 3. Efficient or clear? Menu interaction design

text.content: In menu interaction design, we tried to accommodate multiple demands from intuitive familiarity to minimalist efficiency:

rich_text.plain_text: In menu interaction design, we tried to accommodate multiple demands from intuitive familiarity to minimalist efficiency:

text.content: Arranging the simplest, most understandable, and commonly used content types in a grid-like button layout allows users to quickly reach their targets while saving space, improving display efficiency, and helping new users quickly grasp document content types;

rich_text.plain_text: Arranging the simplest, most understandable, and commonly used content types in a grid-like button layout allows users to quickly reach their targets while saving space, improving display efficiency, and helping new users quickly grasp document content types;

text.content: Other less frequent types or less familiar content types that need textual explanation are displayed as Icon+Text, making them easier to understand;

rich_text.plain_text: Other less frequent types or less familiar content types that need textual explanation are displayed as Icon+Text, making them easier to understand;

text.content: Advanced users can input keywords to search, quickly obtaining target types;

rich_text.plain_text: Advanced users can input keywords to search, quickly obtaining target types;

text.content: As a new document editor, the product design process involves numerous scenarios and details. In the months from first internal launch to official release, we continuously reflected, iterated, and validated based on weekly user feedback. The cases above represent just a small portion of the many design tradeoffs we made.

rich_text.plain_text: As a new document editor, the product design process involves numerous scenarios and details. In the months from first internal launch to official release, we continuously reflected, iterated, and validated based on weekly user feedback. The cases above represent just a small portion of the many design tradeoffs we made.

text.content: Results

rich_text.plain_text: Results

text.content: Zoom Docs was officially released in September 2024, achieving a 96% penetration rate from Zoom to Zoom Docs, with current MAU approaching one million. The design experience details are frequently discussed as exemplary experience cases within Zoom teams and have received widespread acclaim.

The design experience details are frequently discussed as exemplary experience cases within Zoom teams and have received widespread acclaim.
